item.text: Now Jesus was standing by the Lake of Gennesaret, and the crowd was pressing around him to hear the word of God.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="4143" class="">boats</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3041" class="">lake</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="231" class="">fishermen</st> had <st data-num="576">gotten out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> and were <st data-num="4150" class="">washing</st> their <st data-num="1350" class="">nets</st>.

He <st data-num="1684" class="">got</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="4143" class="">boats</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon’s</st>, and <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="1877">put out</st> a <st data-num="3641">little way</st> <st data-num="575">from</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">shore</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="2" /> Jesus<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2523" class="">sat down</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">taught</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st> he had <st data-num="3973" class="">finished</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st>, he <st data-num="2036" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>, “<st data-num="1877">Put out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="899">deep water</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5465" class="">lower</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1350" class="">nets</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="61" class="">catch</st>.”

<st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="1988">Master</st>,<n id="3" /> we <st data-num="2872">worked hard</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> and <st data-num="2983" class="">caught</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st>! <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4487" class="">word</st><n id="4" /> I will <st data-num="5465" class="">lower</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="1350" class="">nets</st>.”

When<n id="1" /> they had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, they <st data-num="4788" class="">caught</st> <st data-num="4128" class="">so</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st> that <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1350" class="">nets</st> started to <st data-num="1284" class="">tear</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2656" class="">motioned</st><n id="2" /> to their <st data-num="3353" class="">partners</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2087" class="">other</st> <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="4815" class="">help</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4130" class="">filled</st> <st data-num="297" class="">both</st> <st data-num="4143" class="">boats</st>, <st data-num="5620">so that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were about to <st data-num="1036" class="">sink</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> it, he <st data-num="4363">fell down</st> at <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="1119" class="">knees</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1831">Go away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> a <st data-num="268" class="">sinful</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>!”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">Peter</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who were <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> were <st data-num="2285" class="">astonished</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="61" class="">catch</st> of <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> they had <st data-num="4815" class="">taken</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3668">so</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, <st data-num="2199">Zebedee’s</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st>, who <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon’s</st> <st data-num="2844">business partners</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>, “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid;</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3568">now on</st><n id="3" /> you will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2221" class="">catching</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>!”<n id="4" />
So when they had brought their boats to shore, they left everything and followed him.

While Jesus was in one of the towns, a man came to him who was covered with leprosy. When he saw Jesus, he bowed down with his face to the ground and begged him, “Lord, if you are willing, you can make me clean.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1614">stretched out</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="681">touched</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “I am <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st>. Be <st data-num="2511" class="">clean</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2112" class="">immediately</st> the <st data-num="3014" class="">leprosy</st> <st data-num="565" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3853" class="">ordered</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">man</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="3367">no one</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> commanded him,<n id="4" /> “<st data-num="565">Go</st><n id="5" /> and <st data-num="1166" class="">show</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st> to a <st data-num="2409" class="">priest</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4374">bring the offering</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="4012">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2512" class="">cleansing</st>, <st data-num="2531">as</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="4367" class="">commanded</st>,<n id="7" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="3142" class="">testimony</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.”<n id="8" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">news</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1330" class="">spread</st> <st data-num="3123">even more</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> were <st data-num="4905">gathering together</st> to <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> him<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to be <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="769" class="">illnesses</st>.
Yet Jesus himself frequently withdrew to the wilderness and prayed.

Now on one of those days, while he was teaching, there were Pharisees and teachers of the law sitting nearby (who had come from every village of Galilee and Judea and from Jerusalem), and the power of the Lord was with him to heal.

<st data-num="2400">Just then</st><n id="1" /> some <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> showed up, <st data-num="5342" class="">carrying</st> a <st data-num="3886" class="">paralyzed</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="2825" class="">stretcher</st>.<n id="3" /> They<n id="4" /> were <st data-num="2212" class="">trying</st> to <st data-num="1533" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> in <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">place</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> since they <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4169" class="">way</st> to <st data-num="1533" class="">carry</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> in <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> of the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, they <st data-num="305">went up</st> <st data-num="1909">on</st> the <st data-num="1430" class="">roof</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="2524">let</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2524" class="">down</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2826" class="">stretcher</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2766" class="">roof tiles</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3319">right</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1715" class="">in front of</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="7" />

When<n id="1" /> Jesus<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="444">Friend</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> are <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st>.”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="1260" class="">think</st><n id="3" /> to themselves,<n id="4" /> “<st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2980">uttering</st> <st data-num="988">blasphemies</st>?<n id="6" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="863" class="">forgive</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> <st data-num="1508">but</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">alone</st>?”

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">perceived</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1261">hostile thoughts</st>,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="1260">raising objections</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">within</st> <st data-num="2588 4771">yourselves</st>?

<st data-num="5101" class="">Which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2123" class="">easier</st>,<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="4771">Your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> are <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven,’</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> to <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1453">Stand up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walk’</st>?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> to <st data-num="863" class="">forgive</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>”—he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="3886">paralyzed man</st><n id="3" />—“I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1453">stand up</st>, <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2826" class="">stretcher</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st>.”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3916" class="">Immediately</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="450">stood up</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="142">picked<n id="2" /> up</st> the stretcher<n id="3" /> he had been <st data-num="2621">lying</st> <st data-num="1909">on</st>, and <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st>, <st data-num="1392" class="">glorifying</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
Then astonishment seized them all, and they glorified God. They were filled with awe, saying, “We have seen incredible things today.”
After this, Jesus went out and saw a tax collector named Levi sitting at the tax booth. “Follow me,” he said to him.
And he got up and followed him, leaving everything behind.
Then Levi gave a great banquet in his house for Jesus, and there was a large crowd of tax collectors and others sitting at the table with them.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1111" class="">complained</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> do you <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5057">tax collectors</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>?”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Those who are <st data-num="5198" class="">well</st> <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> a <st data-num="2395" class="">physician</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> those who are <st data-num="2560" class="">sick</st> do.<n id="2" />
I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.”
Then they said to him, “John’s disciples frequently fast and pray, and so do the disciples of the Pharisees, but yours continue to eat and drink.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “You <st data-num="3361 1410">cannot</st> make the <st data-num="3567">wedding</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">guests</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3522" class="">fast</st> <st data-num="1722">while</st> the <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, can you?<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> those <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> are <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st> is <st data-num="522" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st><n id="2" /> they will <st data-num="3522" class="">fast</st>.”

He <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> a <st data-num="3850" class="">parable:</st><n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3762" class="">No one</st> <st data-num="4977" class="">tears</st> a <st data-num="1915" class="">patch</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> a <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">garment</st> and <st data-num="1911" class="">sews</st><n id="2" /> it <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> an <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">garment</st>. <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> he does, he will have <st data-num="4977" class="">torn</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1915" class="">piece</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> will <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="4856" class="">match</st> the <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="906" class="">pours</st> <st data-num="3501" class="">new</st> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st> <st data-num="779" class="">wineskins</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> he does, the <st data-num="3501" class="">new</st> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> will <st data-num="4486" class="">burst</st> the <st data-num="779" class="">skins</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will be <st data-num="1632" class="">spilled</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="779" class="">skins</st> will be <st data-num="622" class="">destroyed</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st> <st data-num="3501">new</st> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> must be <st data-num="992" class="">poured</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="779" class="">wineskins</st>.<n id="1" />
No one after drinking old wine wants the new, for he says, ‘The old is good enough.’”
